basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Engineering and Physics Scholarship Committe

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Engineering and Physics. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Engineering and Physics majors Two faculty recommendation letters
